name: Buzzy Honey Bee - Nectar Trip
description:
Buzzy Honey Bee – Nectar Trip is a very addictive casual arcade game.

Help the little cute buzzy honey queen bee fly high and collect nectar coins; but beware of the obstacles in the nectar trip. Watch out for the cactus spikes and the hornet nest. Just keep the little honey bee away from the cactus spikes and the wasp sting. If you hit them, you lose. Don't let the flappy bee trip turn into a nectar trap. Don't let the spikes kill the little buzzy honey bee.

Just fly upwards and collect nectar coins in the way to help the little queen honey bee make her way up through the dangerous spikes and obstacles and return to the beehive with a lot of nectar to make plenty of honey. Your mission is to help the buzzy bee survive and be the best nectar collector of her hive. Beat other players and be the first 'Buzzy Honey Bee' buddy.

Are you up for the challenge? How far can you go?

This is a super fun game and simple to play but very challenging; kids will enjoy and love this little bee game very much.

{ FEATURES }
✓ Playable on phone and tablet,
✓ Free to play. Just download it and play. Have fun and relax,
✓ Simple graphics,
✓ Simple 1 Touch Controls. Tap anywhere on the screen,
✓ Restart Feature – Player can restart game after game over,
✓ Pause Feature – Player can pause the game at any time by pressing the back button,
✓ Sound on/off,
✓ Leaderboard/achievements – Compare your score with others' in global leaderboard. Challenge your friends to play this fun, addictive game and beat their score. Compete for the best score in the world,
✓ Top Score – The game saves the Best Scores on the user's Device,
✓ Share your best score over social media, via facebook, whatsapp, twitter, email, etc to compete with your friends,
✓ Rate Feature.

{ HOW TO PLAY }
> Tap the screen to change the bee's direction to left or right in a zigzag movement.
> Try to hit the nectar coins.
> Avoid the spikes of cactus (don't touch the spikes on the two edges) and wasp nests.
> Share your best score over social media.
